TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrintQueueStream extends System.IO.Stream

summary.span: 一个流，表示打印队列中进行后台处理的打印作业。

span.span: A stream that represents a spooled print job in a print queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类用于写入到未自动包括的假脱机文件的设备特定信息[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)]后台处理程序。Use this class to write device specific information to a spool file that is not automatically included by the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win](~/includes/tlasharptla-win-md.md)] spooler. 当然，你需要知道假脱机文件是否[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_emf](~/includes/tlasharptla-emf-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]。Of course, you need to know whether the spool file is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_emf](~/includes/tlasharptla-emf-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]. 如果你愿意使用数组，你还可以使用两个重载方法和写入假脱机文件的属性。If you prefer working with a array, you can also use two of the overloads of the method and the property to write to the spool file. > [!CAUTION] > 类中命名空间不支持的 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中的使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试使用这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果你想要从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印，请参阅命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace.

summary.span: 关闭流并释放与之关联的所有资源（如套接字和文件句柄）。

span.span: Closes the stream and releases any resources, such as sockets and file handles, that are associated with it.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool A_0);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool A_0) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (A_0 As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool A_0);

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源并（可选）释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法方法。This method is called by the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法未命名的布尔参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the unnamed Boolean parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`未命名的布尔参数设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with the unnamed Boolean parameter set to `false`. 未命名的布尔型参数时`true`，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的所有资源此引用。When the unnamed Boolean parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写，请注意不要引用以前已释放的以前调用在对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that were previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: ~PrintQueueStream ();
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed
Finalize ()
!PrintQueueStream ()

summary.span: 使 在垃圾回收已收回 之前尝试释放资源并执行其他清理操作。

span.span: Enables a to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before the is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 应用程序代码不应调用此方法。对象的`Finalize`方法过程中将自动调用垃圾回收，除非已通过调用禁用垃圾回收器的终止方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Finalize 方法和析构函数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Read (byte[] buffer, int offset, int count);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 Read(unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read (buffer As Byte(), offset As Integer, count As Integer) As Integer
public: override int Read(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count);

param.name: buffer
param.span: 字节数组。

span.span: An array of bytes.

param.name: offset
param.span: 缓冲区（想在此开始存储从流中读取的数据）中从零开始的字节偏移量。

span.span: The zero-based byte offset in the buffer where you want to begin storing the data that is read from the stream.

param.name: count
param.span: 要从流中读取的最大字节数。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes to be read from the stream.

summary.span: 从流中读取字节序列，并按所读取的字节数向前移动在流中的读/写位置。

span.span: Reads a sequence of bytes from the stream and advances the read/write position in the stream by the number of bytes that were read.

returns.span: 一个 ，拥有读入缓冲区的字节总数。

span.span: An that holds the total number of bytes that are read into the buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果很多字节当前不可用; 返回值可能小于请求的字节数或者，读/写位置位于流结尾数可以是零 (0)。The return value can be less than the number of requested bytes if that many bytes are not currently available; or the number can be zero (0) if the read/write position is at the end of the stream. 此方法返回时，`buffer`包含指定的字节数组和之间的值`offset`和 （offset + count-1） 由从源中读取的字节替换。When this method returns, `buffer` contains the specified byte array and the values between `offset` and (offset + count - 1) are replaced by the bytes that are read from the source.

public: override long Seek(long offset, System::IO::SeekOrigin origin);

param.name: offset
param.span: 相对于 origin 参数的字节偏移量。

span.span: A byte offset that is relative to the origin parameter.

param.name: origin
param.span: 类型的值，指示用于获取新位置的参考点。

span.span: A value of type that indicates the reference point that is used to obtain the new position.

summary.span: 设置流中的读取/写入位置。

span.span: Sets the read/write position within the stream.
An that represents the new read/write position.

span.span: The needed length, in bytes, of the current stream.

summary.span: 设置流的长度。

span.span: Sets the length of the stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 流必须支持写入和查找有关工作。A stream must support both writing and seeking for to work. 使用属性来确定当前实例是否支持写入，然后使用属性来确定是否支持查找。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports writing, and use the property to determine whether seeking is supported.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Write (byte[] buffer, int offset, int count);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Write(unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Write (buffer As Byte(), offset As Integer, count As Integer)
public: override void Write(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count);

param.name: buffer
param.span: 要从其复制到流的字节数组。

span.span: An array of bytes from which to copy to the stream.

param.name: offset
param.span: buffer 中从零开始的字节偏移量，从此处开始将字节复制到流中。

span.span: The zero-based byte offset in the buffer where you want to begin copying bytes to the stream.

param.name: count
param.span: 要写入流的字节数。

span.span: The number of bytes to write to the stream.

summary.span: 将字节序列写入流，并按所写入的字节数向前移动在流中的读/写位置。

span.span: Writes a sequence of bytes to the stream and advances the read/write position in the stream by the number of bytes that are written.
